forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this morning transitioning to light rain for the afternoon. High 3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow this morning transitioning to light rain late. High around 40F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 36F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 39F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 41F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening turning to all snow late. Low around 0C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low 34F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 3C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow during the afternoon. High 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will mix with rain at times during the afternoon. High 37F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low -1C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Low 31F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.
